label: Food Memoirs: Delicious Tales of Culinary Coming-Of-Age
description: They embraced the world of food-eating it, cooking it, and reflecting on it. Devour these stories that trace their personal journeys to find a place in the kitchen and the world.

list.label: Always home : a daughter's culinary memoir
Blue plate special : an autobiography of my appetites
Cleaving : a story of marriage, meat, and obsession
Kitchen yarns : notes on life, love, and food
L'appart : the delights and disasters of making my Paris home
